de.esoco.ewt.layout

Interface LayoutFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLayoutFactory

    public interface LayoutFactory
    A factory interface that creates container layouts. EWT extensions can use this to replace default layouts with their own instances. Some layouts may require initialization and can therefore only be replaced after they have been created. For this purpose extensions may also need to implement the LayoutMapper interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GenericLayout createLayout(Container rParentContainer, StyleData rContainerStyle, de.esoco.lib.property.LayoutType eLayout)
      Checks whether the given layout for a particular target container should be mapped to a different layout instance and returns that if applicable.

    • Method Detail

      • createLayout

        GenericLayout createLayout(Container rParentContainer,
                           StyleData rContainerStyle,
                           de.esoco.lib.property.LayoutType eLayout)
        Checks whether the given layout for a particular target container should be mapped to a different layout instance and returns that if applicable.
        Parameters:
        rParentContainer - The parent of the container for which the layout is created
        rContainerStyle - rContainer The target container for the layout
        eLayout - The original layout for the container
        Returns:
        Either a new (mapped) layout instance or the original layout if no mapping is necessary
